title: Modern Linguistic Interpretation of Ancient Greek Drama: Expert Mantle-Based Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in Western classical literature, drama analysis methodologies, and basic grammar/vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Focuses on practicing professionals reinterpretating and applying ancient Greek drama in modern contexts, emphasizing text analysis and creative expression skills.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social and ethical themes in ancient Greek drama from linguistic and literary perspectives, linking them to modern issues using the expert mantle technique.
Learners can creatively adapt key scenes from ancient plays using digital tools and produce performance scenarios incorporating dialogue construction and expressive techniques.
Learners enhance critical thinking and collaboration skills in drama interpretation through peer evaluations and exchange feedback on diverse expressive methods.

resources: Ancient Greek Drama Original Texts and Translations

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
